      • processPointerEvent

        public boolean processPointerEvent(MotionEvent evt,
                          boolean downEvent)
        Convert a motion event to a format suitable for sending over the wire
        参数:
        evt - motion event; x and y must already have been converted from screen coordinates to remote frame buffer coordinates. cameraButton flag is interpreted as second mouse button
        downEvent - True if "mouse button" (touch or trackball button) is down when this happens
        返回:
        true if event was actually sent

      • processPointerEvent

        public boolean processPointerEvent(MotionEvent evt,
                          boolean downEvent,
                          boolean useRightButton)
        Convert a motion event to a format suitable for sending over the wire
        参数:
        evt - motion event; x and y must already have been converted from screen coordinates to remote frame buffer coordinates.
        downEvent - True if "mouse button" (touch or trackball button) is down when this happens
        useRightButton - If true, event is interpreted as happening with right mouse button
        返回:
        true if event was actually sent
